class.name: UtilityAIBTLimiter
class.brief_description: Ticks its child for [member max_repeat_times] and then returns -1 (failure) until the node is reset.
class.description: The limiter node ticks its child for [member max_repeat_times] and then returns -1 (failure) until the node is reset.

members.member: The maximum times the limiter node can be ticked.
